titles.title: A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of high-density, fiberboard-core laminate wall and floor panels, and for other purposes.
A bill to provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of high-density, fiberboard-core laminate wall and floor panels, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Directs U.S. Customs and Border Protection to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries of high-density, fiberboard-core laminate wall and floor panels.
